thread.title: Phantom Cyber Fetches $350 Million in Acquisition by Splunk

author: Cat Zakrzewski
title: Phantom Cyber Fetches $350 Million in Acquisition by Splunk
text:
Splunk Inc. has agreed to acquire venture-backed Phantom Cyber Corp. for about $350 million in cash and stock, as the big-data specialist seeks to expand its cybersecurity offerings. 

The acquisition, Splunk’s largest acquisition to date, is also a notable exit for Phantom’s investors, which include Kleiner Perkins Caufield & Byers, TechOperators Venture Capital, Blackstone, Foundation Capital, In-Q-Tel and Rein Capital. Phantom, founded four years ago, had raised about $23 million, and its valuation was just under $100... To Read the Full Story Subscribe Sign In
